rows.label: bf05100100_0010
rows.name:
What a strange place.
To think there's a tunnel in the clouds.

rows.label: bf05100100_0020
rows.name:
That's because this is an archipelago formed of small 
Divine Beasts clustered together.

rows.label: bf05100100_0030
rows.name:
The force fields connecting the Divine Beasts
are what create the tunnels.

rows.label: bf05100100_0040
rows.name:
There is a large Divine Beast as well,
at the center of the cloud mountains.

rows.label: bf05100100_0050
rows.name:
However, since that one is in the Cloud Sea,
it's not suitable for people to live on.

rows.label: bf05100100_0060
rows.name:
The small Divine Beasts seem to like clustering around the
larger one, and that's what forms the archipelago.

rows.label: bf05100100_0070
rows.name: There are so many different places in the world, meh!

rows.label: bf05100100_0080
rows.name: Masterpon, you should go outside more.

rows.label: bf05100100_0090
rows.name:
Staying cooped up in your room tinkering with machines 
all the time is bad for your health, meh.

rows.label: bf05100100_0100
rows.name: Tora on wonderful adventure with Boss right now though!

rows.label: bf05100100_0110
rows.name: I'm not a shut-in or a house guard, meh!

rows.label: bf05100100_0120
rows.name:
That's right.
Tora is now a splendid Driver.

rows.label: bf05100100_0130
rows.name: As expected of Boss, you understand well, meh!
